missionProperties.startingObjective: Open the door to the Garage.
missionProperties.missionInfo:
{-} The door is locked to all figures except <color="red">Han Solo</color>.
{-} The mission progresses when the door to the Garage is opened.
{-} The Rebels lose when <color="red">Han Solo</color> is defeated.

globalEvents.name: Open Crate 1
globalEvents.eventText:
You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

globalEvents.eventText:

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

globalEvents.name: Mission Briefing
globalEvents.eventText:
"You're just in time," Han Solo remarks as you arrive. "I heard about an Imperial officer working sorne sort of operation out here."

"Now, I've checked the place out. It's locked up pretty tight," he says, waving you forward and holding up a small metallic chit, "but the guards are just so careless with their keycards." He grins.

{-} Deploy the heroes to the blue highlighted space.
{-} Deploy <color="red">Han Solo</color> (Scoundrel) to the red highlighted space.
{-} The door is locked to all figures except <color="red">Han Solo</color>.
{-} The mission progresses when the door to the Garage is opened.
{-} The Rebels lose when <color="red">Han Solo</color> is defeated.

globalEvents.name: End of Mission - Rebels win
globalEvents.eventText:
"No hard feelings for Nar Shadaa," Han says sarcastically. He turns to you, smiling. "Thanks guys, I owe you one. If you ever find yourself in a tight spot, maybe I can repay the favor."

{-} The Rebels win the mission!
{-} Heroes receive <color="red">Han Solo</color> (Scoundrel) as an ally.
{-} Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 100 credits per hero.

globalEvents.name: End of Mission - Rebels lose
globalEvents.eventText:
Han ducks as a volley of blaster fire sizzles overhead. "Huh," he says, firing back. "Didn't think there'd be so many."

Imperials continue to press forward; before long you disengage, unable to handle their sheer numbers.

{-} The Rebels lose the mission.
{-} Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 100 credits per hero.

globalEvents.name: Old Friends
globalEvents.eventText:
The door slides open and the officer looks up in alarm. "Han? What are you doing here?" 

Han smiles. "Hey there, Gerrin. I heard you bought yourself a military commission. I'm just here to congratulate you." He raises his blaster.

{-} Deploy an <color="red">Imperial Officer</color>. This is Gerrin.
{-} Apply additional Health equal to twice the threat level to Gerrin.

entityProperties.name: Garage Door
entityProperties.theText:
This door leads into the Garage.

It is locked to all figures except <color="red">Han Solo</color>.

eventActions.theText:
Gerrin aims at Han, but Han shoots first.

{-} <color="red">Han Solo</color> may interrupt to perform an attack targeting Gerrin.

{-} Apply additional Health equal to twice the threat level to Gerrin.
{-} The Rebels win when Gerrin is defeated.
{-} The Rebels lose when <color="red">Han Solo</color> is defeated.

globalEvents.name: Old Friends 1
globalEvents.eventText:
Gerrin grimaces, then fires back with an expression of anger on his face.

{-} Gerrin becomes <color="red">Focused</color>. Then, he interrupts and moves 3 to attack <color="red">Han Solo</color>.

globalEvents.name: Old Friends 2
globalEvents.eventText: More troops rush into the Garage. The last ones to enter carry a heavy blaster cannon.

globalEvents.name: Regulars
globalEvents.eventText: A door in the back of the Cantina opens, and snarling bounty hunters rush in, trailing their weapons at Han Solo.
